title: Get started with Service Management
content:
The Service Management includes components as described in the following table.

Component Description
Service Management  Service Management provides a tool for service desk and help desk management that quickly and efficiently handles change and incident management. Service Management integrates a broad range of suite capabilities, Big Data, and social collaboration to enable your workforce with connected intelligence.
Smart Analytics Smart Analytics is a big data-based Service Desk solution. Smart Analytics can help you achieve the following goals:
  • Improve the Help Desk management processes
  • Reduce the time and effort that end users and IT professionals expend on submitting requests
  • Accelerate the process of problem management
  • Improve the search experience across a variety of internal and external content
Service Portal Service Portal enables IT departments to offer their services in an online shopping experience, similar to the experience today at popular online retailers. With Service Portal, end users can order, track, and manage their IT services, access knowledge articles, initiate chat conversations, and complete surveys.
Mobile app A native mobile app that connects your organization's people and information by providing your team access to the Service Desk applications and knowledge articles on mobile devices.
